attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: VAT to remain at 15%, increasing the  rate of VAT back to 17.5% will a have  negative impact on the UK economy, society and mainly low-social economic areas will suffer the most, the public tax payer should not be liable for the banks errors, Millions of cizitens who pay thier taxes, what do they get in return? the Answer is "Nothing" when its the public's money being spent not the governments, Please bear in mind that the government will increase the VAT back to 17.5 at the end of December 2009, please sign the petition
